title: Audio Issues with Pixel3A after Android 10 Updates
content:
When phone is connected to bluetooth I can hear it ring, but once it picks up I hear nothing.
> Tried disconnecting and reconnecting the bluetooth.
> Forgetting the device entirely and reconnecting.
> Rebooting the phone and trying again.
> Other devices work fine when connected, just this one is failing.

When phone is connected to bluetooth I can't play any audio through spotify, youtube, netflix, etc, (but phone sounds work, i.e. new message, phone call, alarm, etc)
*Same steps as above

When phone is plugged into headphones I can't hear anything but like issue 2, phone sounds work.
> Tried about 5 sets of headphones, that all work on other devices.
> Rebooting phone.
